metadata.name: try_swf_7
metadata.description: Tests ActionTry (0x8F) and ActionThrow (0x2A) opcodes for exception handling with try-catch blocks

known_issues: setjmp/longjmp control flow issue: longjmp from within try block doesn't properly skip to catch block
Exception is thrown but remaining try block code still executes
Needs restructuring - setjmp must be at script level, not in function call
